readme: NOTE: This feature is designed for use in user-hosted copies of the site, and not for integrating "official" 5etools content.
The "production" version of the site (i.e., not the development ZIP) has this feature disabled. You can re-enable it by deleting `_IS_DEPLOYED = "X.Y.Z",` from the file `js/utils.js`
This file contains as an index for other homebrew files, which should be placed in the same directory.
For example, add "My Homebrew.json" to the "toImport" array below, and have a valid JSON homebrew file in this ("homebrew/") directory.
